snippet: If weak state economies keep getting better -- which is not at all certain -- Republicans could be hurt in November, David Leonhardt notes on The Caucus.
abstract: If weak state economies keep getting better -- which is not at all certain -- Republicans could be hurt in November, David Leonhardt notes on The Caucus.
